oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1956-01-14 - Part 2
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 2 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from January 14, 1956. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Carl Smith (host/performer), guest performer Hawkshaw Hawkins, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Del Wood, Minnie Pearl, and Chet Atkins. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Minnie Pearl; Hawkshaw Hawkins; Chet Atkins; Carl Smith
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Carl Smith introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl, Carl Smith) -- Carl Smith introduces Hawkshaw Hawkins -- Borrowing (Hawkshaw Hawkins) -- Carl Smith introduces Chet Atkins -- Corrine, Corrina (Chet Atkins) -- Carl Smith talks -- I Feel Like Cryin' (Carl Smith) -- Closing theme -- Closing statement (Carl Smith) -- Cavalier Cigarettes commercial -- Station announcements
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Ryman Auditorium (Nashville, Tenn.); Hay, George D. (George Dewey), 1895-1968; Brasfield, Rod; Minnie Pearl; Wood, Del; Atkins, Chet; Smith, Carl, 1927-2010; Hawkins, Hawkshaw, 1921-1963
